metadata.title: CVE-2018-11693 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in LibSass through 3.5.4. An out-of-bounds read of a memory region was found in the function Sass::Prelexer::skip_over_scopes which could be leveraged by an attacker to disclose information or manipulated to read from unmapped memory causing a denial of service.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2018-11693` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libsass1 - 3.5.5-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libsass package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.5.5-2').
